text: « ‹Ni zii ta ɓaa masadai ta a ɠɛna ná, é la kɛɛni é ʋa ɠolo Ɓaɓilɔne masagi Neɓukadenɛzaal ʋɛ, ni ti la kɛɛni ti ʋa lɔ ná-unbawului wu, nà wuzeɠe ti laalɔɠɔma ga kɔɔi, ta pului, ta ɗɔfɔ zeeɓɛi, eyɛsu gè ti-ma zuwu ɠaaleʋe ga ma Ɓaɓilɔne masagi Neɓukadenɛzaal yeei,› » Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠana.
